title: Zerra One - Zerra One [1984] + The Domino Effect [1986]
description:
Zerra One or Zerra I, was nn Irish New Wave band Founded in 1982 by the core duo of Paul Bell (keyboards/vocals) and guitarist Grimmo AKA Andreas Grimminger. They released two full LPs and a handful of singles. Their debut 1984 LP was released in Canada under album name Mountains And Water with a slightly different track listing. The CDs are quite rare and much sought after by 80s new wave fanatics.
